mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCESS_LOG (ACCESS_LOG_NO, EMAIL, LOGIN_DATE) VALUES (ACCESS_LOG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{email}, SYSDATE)

INSERT INTO USERS (USER_NO, EMAIL, PW, ARTIST, NAME, GENDER, MOBILE, BIRTHYEAR, BIRTHDAY, POSTCODE, ROAD_ADDRESS, JIBUN_ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, EXTRA_ADDRESS, AGREE_CODE, SNS_TYPE, JOIN_DATE, PW_MODIFY_DATE, INFO_MODIFY_DATE, SESSION_ID, SESSION_LIMIT_DATE) VALUES (USERS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{pw}, #{artist}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{mobile}, #{birthyear}, #{birthday}, #{postcode}, #{roadAddress}, #{jibunAddress}, #{detailAddress}, #{extraAddress}, #{agreeCode}, NULL, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, NULL, NULL)

INSERT INTO PROFILEIMAGE (PROFILEIMAGE_NO, PROFILEIMAGE_PATH, PROFILEIMAGE_ORIGIN, PROFILEIMAGE_FILESYSTEM, EMAIL) VALUES (PROFILEIMAGE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{profileImagePath}, #{profileImageOrigin}, #{profileImageFilesystem}, #{email})

INSERT INTO SLEEP_USERS(USER_NO, PW, ARTIST, NAME, GENDER, EMAIL, MOBILE, BIRTHYEAR, BIRTHDAY, POSTCODE, ROAD_ADDRESS, JIBUN_ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, EXTRA_ADDRESS, AGREE_CODE, SNS_TYPE, JOIN_DATE, SLEEP_DATE) (SELECT U.USER_NO, U.PW, U.ARTIST, U.NAME, U.GENDER, U.EMAIL, U.MOBILE, U.BIRTHYEAR, U.BIRTHDAY, U.POSTCODE, U.ROAD_ADDRESS, U.JIBUN_ADDRESS, U.DETAIL_ADDRESS, U.EXTRA_ADDRESS, U.AGREE_CODE, U.SNS_TYPE, U.JOIN_DATE, SYSDATE FROM USERS U LEFT OUTER JOIN ACCESS_LOG A ON U.EMAIL = A.EMAIL WHERE MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, A.LOGIN_DATE) >= 12 OR (MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, U.JOIN_DATE) >= 12 AND A.LOGIN_DATE IS NULL))
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM USERS WHERE EMAIL IN (SELECT U.EMAIL FROM USERS U LEFT OUTER JOIN ACCESS_LOG A ON U.EMAIL = A.EMAIL WHERE MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, A.LOGIN_DATE) >= 12 OR (MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, U.JOIN_DATE) >= 12 AND A.LOGIN_DATE IS NULL))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS(USER_NO, PW, ARTIST, NAME, GENDER, EMAIL, MOBILE, BIRTHYEAR, BIRTHDAY, POSTCODE, ROAD_ADDRESS, JIBUN_ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, EXTRA_ADDRESS, AGREE_CODE, SNS_TYPE, JOIN_DATE) (SELECT USER_NO, PW, ARTIST, NAME, GENDER, EMAIL, MOBILE, BIRTHYEAR, BIRTHDAY, POSTCODE, ROAD_ADDRESS, JIBUN_ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, EXTRA_ADDRESS, AGREE_CODE, SNS_TYPE, JOIN_DATE FROM SLEEP_USERS WHERE EMAIL = #{email})
INSERT INTO RETIRE_USERS (USER_NO, EMAIL, ARTIST, RETIRE_DATE) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{email}, #{artist}, SYSDATE)
